Workshops

Greater Boston Area • Winter 2026

We're a cooperative skill-sharing group, focused on the outdoors. We tend to meet at local parks, farms, and town lands. Help us to build out our fall schedule by volunteering to offer teach something you know how to do -- or just faciliate at group investigation into a topic!

February 2026

Easy Off-Grid Mesh Radio

Introduction to local radio contruction and use
February 2026

Gentle Introduction to DIY Solar

Learn the basics of off-grid solar power - for kids and adults

Upcoming

Farming Gardening Water Collection Water Filtering Water Testing Shelter Radio Electronics STEM Arts & Crafts Woodworking Metalworking

Below are some workshops we are considering offering soon. If you'd be interested to attend (or teach!) any of them -- or have an idea for another workshop! -- please let us know at info@waterbearfieldschool.org.

Bicycle Mechanics Basics

Learn essential bike maintenance and repair skills for keeping your bicycle in top condition

Introduction to Welding

Learn basic welding skills while creating a musical Butaphone instrument from a gas bottle

Leather Sandal Making

Craft your own custom leather sandals from scratch using traditional techniques

Rocket Stove Building

Build your own high-efficiency portable rocket stove for clean, efficient cooking

Woodworking Techniques

Learn traditional woodworking techniques to create unique small furniture pieces
